response.original_title: ​But for now all I can promise is that things will become weirder
response.overview: But for now all I can promise is that things will become weirder reflects on the ambiguous sense of numbness that arises from the constant stream and rhythm of contemporary reality. Information, images, sounds, and events accumulate and overlap, blurring boundaries and creating a paradox of excess and uncanniness. Within this shifting flow, hierarchies of meaning and value collapse and get rearranged continuously.
response.title: ​But for now all I can promise is that things will become weirder
